result.title: NOCO Long Contest 2!
result.content:
UPD6. The solutions have all been rejudged!! If you have questions about the problems, please post them in the comments.

UPD5. Due to agreement by consensus, the contest will end TODAY at 8:15 PM. I'll start system testing solutions around 8:30, so make sure to get your testcases in by then.

UPD4. Hmm so no one's submitting anymore. Does anyone really care if I end this contest now? If you say "no", then you should submit at least once to show why.

By the way, I've only received one submission for testcases. You should all send me some, unless you believe in my system tests (not recommended).

UPD3. The contest is about to start. Please remember the following things:

(1) If you receive "Accepted" during the contest, please do not celebrate. Treat it only as "Pretests passed."

(2) You may send us up to FIVE testcases per problem that you want to include in the final tests. Email to nationalomsc (at) gmail (dot) com. Please email all testcases in one email; don't send 13 different emails.

--

Note: The actual, real, non-edited contest time is Friday, October 10, 2014 at 8:15 PM CDT to the same time on Monday, October 13.

The scoring distribution is 1 — 1 — 1 — 1 — 1 — 1 — 1. The contest will use ACM-ICPC scoring; every submission you make will be determined on the time since the beginning of the contest with an additional penalty for resubmissions.

Since the problems are all worth the same, naturally they aren't in any order of difficulty. Therefore we strongly suggest you to read ALL the problems!!!

Good luck in about 12 days!

UPD. I think it's time to give a small teaser about the problems. Every problem is of the form "Andrew and _________". The following lists the first characters of each "_________": D, U, B, D, A, 1, H. This post will be updated with more descriptive hints as the contest date approaches. Good luck in about 5 days!

UPD2. First letter and first vowel.

Andrew and Di
Andrew and Ui
Andrew and Bo
Andrew and Di (2 words!)
Andrew and Ao
Andrew and 1  (no vowels)
Andrew and Ho (2 words!)
